data.name: WINERR_CLASSFACTORY_E_FIRST
data.value: This object does not support aggregation

data.name: WINERR_CO_E_ALREADYINITIALIZED
data.value: CoInitialize has already been called.

data.name: WINERR_CO_E_NOTINITIALIZED
data.value: CoInitialize has not been called.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_BAD_NUMBER
data.value: Invalid number.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_DISPLAY_FORMAT_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: The display format we need to render is not supported by the hardware device.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_DISPLAY_STATE_INVALID
data.value: A valid display state could not be determined.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_INCOMPATIBLE_BRUSH_TYPES
data.value: The brush types are incompatible for the call.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_INTERNAL_ERROR
data.value: An internal error (D2D bug) occurred. On checked builds we would assert.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_INVALID_CALL
data.value: A call to this method is invalid.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_LAYER_ALREADY_IN_USE
data.value: A layer resource can only be in use once at any point in time.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_MAX_TEXTURE_SIZE_EXCEEDED
data.value: Requested DX surface size exceeded maximum texture size.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_NOT_INITIALIZED
data.value: The object has not yet been initialized.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_NO_HARDWARE_DEVICE
data.value: No HW rendering device is available for this operation.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_POP_CALL_DID_NOT_MATCH_PUSH
data.value: The pop call did not match the corresponding push call

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_PUSH_POP_UNBALANCED
data.value: The push and pop calls were unbalanced

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_RECREATE_TARGET
data.value: here has been a presentation error that may be recoverable. The caller needs to recreate

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_RENDER_TARGET_HAS_LAYER_OR_CLIPRECT
data.value: Attempt to copy from a render target while a layer or clip rect is applied

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_SCANNER_FAILED
data.value: The geomery scanner failed to process the data.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_SCREEN_ACCESS_DENIED
data.value: D2D could not access the screen.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_SHADER_COMPILE_FAILED
data.value: Shader compilation failed.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_TARGET_NOT_GDI_COMPATIBLE
data.value: The render target is not compatible with GDI

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_TEXT_EFFECT_IS_WRONG_TYPE
data.value: A text client drawing effect object is of the wrong type

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_TEXT_RENDERER_NOT_RELEASED
data.value: The application is holding a reference to the IDWriteTextRenderer interface after the corresponding DrawText or DrawTextLayout call has returned. The IDWriteTextRenderer instance will be zombied.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_TOO_MANY_SHADER_ELEMENTS
data.value: Shader construction failed because it was too complex.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_UNSUPPORTED_OPERATION
data.value: The requested opertion is not supported.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_UNSUPPORTED_PIXEL_FORMAT
data.value: The pixel format is not supported.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION
data.value: The requested D2D version is not supported.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_WIN32_ERROR
data.value: An unknown win32 failure occurred.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_WRONG_FACTORY
data.value: Objects used together must be created from the same factory instance.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_WRONG_STATE
data.value: The object was not in the correct state to process the method.

data.name: WINERR_D2DERR_ZERO_VECTOR
data.value: The supplied vector is zero.

data.name: WINERR_D3D10_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: File not found

data.name: WINERR_D3D10_ERROR_TOO_MANY_UNIQUE_STATE_OBJECTS
data.value: There are too many unique state objects.

data.name: WINERR_D3D11_ERROR_DEFERRED_CONTEXT_MAP_WITHOUT_INITIAL_DISCARD
data.value: Deferred context requires Map-Discard usage pattern

data.name: WINERR_D3D11_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: File not found

data.name: WINERR_D3D11_ERROR_TOO_MANY_UNIQUE_STATE_OBJECTS
data.value: There are too many unique state objects.

data.name: WINERR_D3D11_ERROR_TOO_MANY_UNIQUE_VIEW_OBJECTS
data.value: Therea are too many unique view objects.

data.value: Contect protection not available

data.value: Conflicting texture palette

data.name: WINERR_D3DXFERR_RESOURCENOTFOUND
data.value: Resource not found

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_ALREADYINITIALIZED
data.value: This object is already initialized

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_BLTFASTCANTCLIP
data.value: If a clipper object is attached to the source surface passed into a BltFast call.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_CANNOTATTACHSURFACE
data.value: This surface can not be attached to the requested surface.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_CANNOTDETACHSURFACE
data.value: This surface can not be detached from the requested surface.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_CANTCREATEDC
data.value: Windows can not create any more DCs or a DC was requested for a paltte-indexed surface when the surface had no palette AND the display mode was not palette-indexed (in this case DirectDraw cannot select a proper palette into the DC).

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_CANTDUPLICATE
data.value: Can't duplicate primary & 3D surfaces or surfaces that are implicitly created.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_CANTLOCKSURFACE
data.value: Access to this surface is being refused because no driver exists which can supply a pointer to the surface. This is most likely to happen when attempting to lock the primary surface when no DCI provider is present. Will also happen on attempts to lock an optimized surface.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_CANTPAGELOCK
data.value: The attempt to page lock a surface failed.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_CANTPAGEUNLOCK
data.value: The attempt to page unlock a surface failed.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_CLIPPERISUSINGHWND
data.value: an attempt was made to set a clip list for a clipper objec that is already monitoring an hwnd.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_COLORKEYNOTSET
data.value: No src color key specified for this operation.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_CURRENTLYNOTAVAIL
data.value: Support is currently not available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_D3DNOTINITIALIZED
data.value: D3D has not yet been initialized.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_DCALREADYCREATED
data.value: A DC has already been returned for this surface. Only one DC can be retrieved per surface.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_DDSCAPSCOMPLEXREQUIRED
data.value: The specified surface type requires specification of the COMPLEX flag

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_DEVICEDOESNTOWNSURFACE
data.value: Surfaces created by one direct draw device cannot be used directly by another direct draw device.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_DIRECTDRAWALREADYCREATED
data.value: A DirectDraw object representing this driver has already been created for this process.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_EXCEPTION
data.value: An exception was encountered while performing the requested operation

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_EXCLUSIVEMODEALREADYSET
data.value: An attempt was made to set the cooperative level when it was already set to exclusive.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_EXPIRED
data.value: The data has expired and is therefore no longer valid.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_HEIGHTALIGN
data.value: Height of rectangle provided is not a multiple of reqd alignment

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_HWNDALREADYSET
data.value: The CooperativeLevel HWND has already been set. It can not be reset while the process has surfaces or palettes created.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_HWNDSUBCLASSED
data.value: HWND used by DirectDraw CooperativeLevel has been subclassed this prevents DirectDraw from restoring state.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_IMPLICITLYCREATED
data.value: This surface can not be restored because it is an implicitly created surface.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INCOMPATIBLEPRIMARY
data.value: Unable to match primary surface creation request with existing primary surface.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDCAPS
data.value: One or more of the caps bits passed to the callback are incorrect.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDCLIPLIST
data.value: DirectDraw does not support provided Cliplist.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDDIRECTDRAWGUID
data.value: The GUID passed to DirectDrawCreate is not a valid DirectDraw driver identifier.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDMODE
data.value: DirectDraw does not support the requested mode

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDOBJECT
data.value: DirectDraw received a pointer that was an invalid DIRECTDRAW object.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDPIXELFORMAT
data.value: pixel format was invalid as specified

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDPOSITION
data.value: returned when the position of the overlay on the destionation is no longer legal for that destionation.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDRECT
data.value: Rectangle provided was invalid.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDSTREAM
data.value: The specified stream contains invalid data

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_INVALIDSURFACETYPE
data.value: The requested action could not be performed because the surface was of the wrong type.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_LOCKEDSURFACES
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because one or more surfaces are locked

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_MOREDATA
data.value: There is more data available than the specified buffer size could hold

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NEWMODE
data.value: The mode test has switched to a new mode.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NO3D
data.value: There is no 3D present.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOALPHAHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no alpha accleration hardware present or available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOBLTHW
data.value: No blter.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOCLIPLIST
data.value: no clip list available

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOCLIPPERATTACHED
data.value: No clipper object attached to surface object

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOCOLORCONVHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no color conversion hardware present or available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOCOLORKEY
data.value: Surface doesn't currently have a color key

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOCOLORKEYHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no hardware support of the dest color key.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOCOOPERATIVELEVELSET
data.value: Create function called without DirectDraw object method SetCooperativeLevel being called.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NODC
data.value: No DC was ever created for this surface.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NODDROPSHW
data.value: No DirectDraw ROP hardware.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NODIRECTDRAWHW
data.value: A hardware only DirectDraw object creation was attempted but the driver did not support any hardware.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NODIRECTDRAWSUPPORT
data.value: No DirectDraw support possible with current display driver

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NODRIVERSUPPORT
data.value: The driver does not enumerate display mode refresh rates.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOEMULATION
data.value: software emulation not available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOEXCLUSIVEMODE
data.value: Operation requires the application to have exclusive mode but the application does not have exclusive mode.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOFLIPHW
data.value: Flipping visible surfaces is not supported.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOFOCUSWINDOW
data.value: Attempt was made to create or set a device window without first setting the focus window

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOGDI
data.value: There is no GDI present.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOHWND
data.value: Clipper notification requires an HWND or no HWND has previously been set as the CooperativeLevel HWND.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOMIPMAPHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no mip-map texture mapping hardware present or available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOMIRRORHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no hardware present or available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOMONITORINFORMATION
data.value: The monitor does not have EDID data.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NONONLOCALVIDMEM
data.value: An attempt was made to allocate non-local video memory from a device that does not support non-local video memory.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOOPTIMIZEHW
data.value: Device does not support optimized surfaces therefore no video memory optimized surfaces.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOOVERLAYDEST
data.value: returned when GetOverlayPosition is called on a overlay that UpdateOverlay has never been called on to establish a destionation.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOOVERLAYHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no overlay hardware present or available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOPALETTEATTACHED
data.value: No palette object attached to this surface.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOPALETTEHW
data.value: No hardware support for 16 or 256 color palettes.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NORASTEROPHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no appropriate raster op hardware present or available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOROTATIONHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no rotation hardware present or available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOSTEREOHARDWARE
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no stereo hardware present or available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOSTRETCHHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no hardware support for stretching

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOSURFACELEFT
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no hardware present which supports stereo surfaces

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOT4BITCOLOR
data.value: DirectDrawSurface is not in 4 bit color palette and the requested operation requires 4 bit color palette.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOT4BITCOLORINDEX
data.value: DirectDrawSurface is not in 4 bit color index palette and the requested operation requires 4 bit color index palette.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOT8BITCOLOR
data.value: DirectDraw Surface is not in 8 bit color mode and the requested operation requires 8 bit color.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOTAOVERLAYSURFACE
data.value: returned when an overlay member is called for a non-overlay surface

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOTEXTUREHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no texture mapping hardware present or available.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOTFLIPPABLE
data.value: An attempt has been made to flip a surface that is not flippable.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOTFOUND
data.value: Requested item was not found

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOTLOADED
data.value: Surface is an optimized surface but has not yet been allocated any memory.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOTLOCKED
data.value: Surface was not locked. An attempt to unlock a surface that was not locked at all

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOTONMIPMAPSUBLEVEL
data.value: Attempt was made to set a palette on a mipmap sublevel

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOTPAGELOCKED
data.value: An attempt was made to page unlock a surface with no outstanding page locks.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOTPALETTIZED
data.value: The surface being used is not a palette-based surface

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOVSYNCHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no hardware support for vertical blank synchronized operations.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOZBUFFERHW
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because there is no hardware support for zbuffer blting.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_NOZOVERLAYHW
data.value: Overlay surfaces could not be z layered based on their BltOrder because the hardware does not support z layering of overlays.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_OUTOFCAPS
data.value: The hardware needed for the requested operation has already been allocated.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_OVERLAPPINGRECTS
data.value: Operation could not be carried out because the source and destination rectangles are on the same surface and overlap each other.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_OVERLAYCANTCLIP
data.value: hardware does not support clipped overlays

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_OVERLAYCOLORKEYONLYONEACTIVE
data.value: Can only have ony color key active at one time for overlays

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_OVERLAYNOTVISIBLE
data.value: returned when GetOverlayPosition is called on a hidden overlay

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_PALETTEBUSY
data.value: Access to this palette is being refused because the palette is already locked by another thread.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_PRIMARYSURFACEALREADYEXISTS
data.value: this process already has created a primary surface

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_REGIONTOOSMALL
data.value: region passed to Clipper::GetClipList is too small.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_SURFACEALREADYATTACHED
data.value: This surface is already attached to the surface it is being attached to.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_SURFACEALREADYDEPENDENT
data.value: This surface is already a dependency of the surface it is being made a dependency of.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_SURFACEBUSY
data.value: Access to this surface is being refused because the surface is already locked by another thread.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_SURFACEISOBSCURED
data.value: Access to Surface refused because Surface is obscured.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_SURFACELOST
data.value: Access to this surface is being refused because the surface is gone. The DIRECTDRAWSURFACE object representing this surface should have Restore called on it.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_SURFACENOTATTACHED
data.value: The requested surface is not attached.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_TESTFINISHED
data.value: The mode test has finished executing.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_TOOBIGHEIGHT
data.value: Height requested by DirectDraw is too large.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_TOOBIGSIZE
data.value: Size requested by DirectDraw is too large -- The individual height and width are OK.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_TOOBIGWIDTH
data.value: Width requested by DirectDraw is too large.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_UNSUPPORTEDFORMAT
data.value: Pixel format requested is unsupported by DirectDraw

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_UNSUPPORTEDMASK
data.value: Bitmask in the pixel format requested is unsupported by DirectDraw

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_UNSUPPORTEDMODE
data.value: The display is currently in an unsupported mode

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_VERTICALBLANKINPROGRESS
data.value: vertical blank is in progress

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_VIDEONOTACTIVE
data.value: The video port is not active

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_WASSTILLDRAWING
data.value: Was still drawing

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_WRONGMODE
data.value: This surface can not be restored because it was created in a different mode.

data.name: WINERR_DDERR_XALIGN
data.value: Rectangle provided was not horizontally aligned on reqd. boundary

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_BADINF
data.value: The INF file for the selected device could not be found or is invalid or is damaged. & The specified purpose ID can't be used for the call.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_CANCELLED
data.value: The user cancelled the install operation. & The stream already has allocated samples and the surface doesn't match the sample format.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_DEVICEFULL
data.value: The device is full. & An invalid media subtype was specified.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_DRIVERFIRST
data.value: Device driver-specific codes. Unless the specific driver has been precisely identified no meaning should be attributed to these values other than that the driver originated the error.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_DRIVERLAST
data.value: Device installer errors.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_EFFECTPLAYING
data.value: An attempt was made to modify parameters of an effect while it is playing. Not all hardware devices support altering the parameters of an effect while it is playing. & Two pins of the same direction cannot be connected together.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_HASEFFECTS
data.value: The device cannot be reinitialized because there are still effects attached to it. & At least one of the pins involved in the operation is already connected.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_INCOMPLETEEFFECT
data.value: The effect could not be downloaded because essential information is missing. For example
data.comment: no axes have been associated with the effect

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_INSUFFICIENTPRIVS
data.value: Unable to IDirectInputJoyConfig_Acquire because the user does not have sufficient privileges to change the joystick configuration. & An invalid media type was specified

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_INVALIDCLASSINSTALLER
data.value: Registry entry or DLL for class installer invalid or class installer not found.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_MAPFILEFAIL
data.value: A mapper file function failed because reading or writing the user or IHV settings file failed. & A run-time error occurred.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_MOREDATA
data.value: Not all the requested information fit into the buffer. & This object can only be created as an aggregated object.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_NOTBUFFERED
data.value: Attempted to read buffered device data from a device that is not buffered. & There is no common media type between these pins.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_NOTDOWNLOADED
data.value: The effect is not downloaded. & The enumerator has become invalid.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_NOTEXCLUSIVEACQUIRED
data.value: The operation cannot be performed unless the device is acquired in DISCL_EXCLUSIVE mode. & This operation cannot be performed because the filter is active.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_REPORTFULL
data.value: SendDeviceData failed because more information was requested to be sent than can be sent to the device. Some devices have restrictions on how much data can be sent to them. (For example there might be a limit on the number of buttons that can be pressed at once.) & No sample buffer allocator is available.

data.name: WINERR_DIERR_UNPLUGGED
data.value: The operation could not be completed because the device is not plugged in. & The operation cannot be performed because the pins are not connected.

data.name: WINERR_DSERR_ALLOCATED
data.value: The call failed because resources (such as a priority level) were already being used by another caller

data.name: WINERR_DSERR_ALREADYINITIALIZED

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_OUT_OF_VIDEO_MEMORY

data.value: Setting a color key would conflict with the palette already set.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_PIN_ALREADY_BLOCKED

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_PIN_ALREADY_BLOCKED_ON_THIS_THREAD
data.value: This thread has already blocked this output pin. There is no need to call IPinFlowControl::Block() again.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_PROCESSOR_NOT_SUITABLE

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_READ_ONLY

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_RPZA

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_SAMPLE_REJECTED

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_START_TIME_AFTER_END

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_STATE_CHANGED

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_TIMEOUT
data.value: A time-out has expired.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_TIME_ALREADY_PASSED
data.value: An attempt was made to queue a command for a time in the past.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_TIME_EXPIRED

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_TOO_MANY_COLORS
data.value: Too many colors for the current display settings.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_TYPE_NOT_ACCEPTED
data.value: This pin cannot use the supplied media type.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_UNKNOWN_FILE_TYPE
data.value: The media type of this file is not recognized.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_UNSUPPORTED_AUDIO

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_UNSUPPORTED_STREAM

data.name: WINERR_VFW_E_WRONG_STATE

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_AUDIO_NOT_RENDERED

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_CANT_CUE

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_CONNECTIONS_DEFERRED
data.value: Some connections have failed and have been deferred.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_DUPLICATE_NAME
data.value: An attempt to add a filter with a duplicate name succeeded with a modified name.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_DVD_CHANNEL_CONTENTS_NOT_AVAILABLE
data.value: The audio stream did not contain sufficient information to determine the contents of each channel.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_DVD_NON_ONE_SEQUENTIAL
data.value: The current title was not a sequential set of chapters (PGC) and the returned timing information might not be continuous.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_DVD_NOT_ACCURATE
data.value: The seek into the movie was not frame accurate.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_ESTIMATED
data.value: The value returned had to be estimated. It's accuracy can not be guaranteed.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_MEDIA_TYPE_IGNORED
data.value: A connection could not be made with the media type in the persistent graph but has been made with a negotiated media type.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_NOPREVIEWPIN
data.value: There was no preview pin available so the capture pin output is being split to provide both capture and preview.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_NO_MORE_ITEMS
data.value: The end of the list has been reached.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_NO_STOP_TIME
data.value: The stop time for the sample was not set.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_PARTIAL_RENDER
data.value: Some of the streams in this movie are in an unsupported format.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_RESERVED
data.value: This success code is reserved for internal purposes within ActiveMovie.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_RESOURCE_NOT_NEEDED
data.value: The resource specified is no longer needed.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_RPZA
data.value: Cannot play back the video stream: format 'RPZA' is not supported.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_SOME_DATA_IGNORED
data.value: The file contained some property settings that were not used.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_STATE_INTERMEDIATE
data.value: The state transition has not completed.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_STREAM_OFF
data.value: The stream has been turned off.

data.name: WINERR_VFW_S_VIDEO_NOT_RENDERED
data.value: Cannot play back the video stream: no suitable decompressor could be found.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ATTRIBUTE_FIXED
data.value: Attribute '%1' has a value that does not match the fixed value defined in the DTD or schema.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_DEFINED
data.value: The attribute '%1' on this element is not defined in the DTD or schema.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
data.value: Attribute '%1' has an invalid value according to the DTD or schema.

data.name: WINERR_XML_DTD_EXPECTING
data.value: Expecting: %1.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ELEMENT_ID_NOT_FOUND
data.value: The attribute '%1' references the ID '%2' which is not defined in the document.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ELEMENT_NOT_COMPLETE
data.value: Element content is incomplete according to the DTD or schema.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ELEMENT_UNDECLARED
data.value: The element '%1' is used but not declared in the DTD or schema.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ELEMENT_UNDEFINED
data.value: Reference to undeclared element: '%1'.

data.name: WINERR_XML_EMPTY_NOT_ALLOWED
data.value: Element cannot be empty according to the DTD or schema.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ENTITY_UNDEFINED
data.value: Reference to undefined entity '%1'.

data.name: WINERR_XML_EXTENT_IN_ATTR
data.value: Cannot reference an external general parsed entity '%1' in an attribute value.

data.name: WINERR_XML_E_NODTD
data.value: The validate method failed because a DTD or schema was not specified in the document.

data.name: WINERR_XML_E_NOTWF
data.value: The validate method failed because the document does not contain exactly one root node.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ILLEGAL_TEXT
data.value: Text is not allowed in this element according to the DTD or schema.

data.name: WINERR_XML_INFINITE_ENTITY_LOOP
data.value: Entity '%1' contains an infinite entity reference loop.

data.name: WINERR_XML_INVALID_CONTENT
data.value: Element content is invalid according to the DTD or schema.

data.name: WINERR_XML_MULTI_FIXED_VALUES
data.value: An attribute declaration cannot contain multiple fixed values: '%1'.

data.name: WINERR_XML_NDATA_INVALID_PE
data.value: Cannot use the NDATA keyword in a parameter entity declaration.

data.name: WINERR_XML_NDATA_INVALID_REF
data.value: Cannot use unparsed entity '%1' in an entity reference.

data.name: WINERR_XML_REQUIRED_ATTRIBUTE_MISSING
data.value: Required attribute '%1' is missing.

data.name: WINERR_XML_REQUIRED_NDATA
data.value: Cannot use a general parsed entity '%1' as the value for attribute '%2'.

data.name: WINERR_XML_ROOT_NAME_MISMATCH
data.value: The name of the top-most element must match the name of the DOCTYPE declaration.

data.name: WINERR_XML_XMLNS_FIXED
data.value: Attribute '%1' must be a #FIXED attribute.
